pageProduct.name: Scholl Instant Hard Skin Remover
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Scholl Instant Hard Skin Remover, 98% agree it provides instant, visible, improvement.

How is Scholl Instant Hard Skin Remover different?


It is a revolutionary way to remove thick, hard skin. Ergonomically designed by the experts at Scholl for comfortable and easy use. Its safety blades are designed to provide effective removal of hard skin. Achieve professional results at home.

Boxed Contents: 1 Instant Hard Skin Remover

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Unfortunately this product is not suitable for people with diabetes or those with poor blood circulation.

Directions

How does Scholl Instant Skin Remover work?
The skin on the foot is unique as it's designed to withstands the day to day pressure of walking and standing. Sometimes prolonged pressure and friction, such as from ill-fitting shoes or being on your feet a lot, can cause hard skin to build up. The experts at Scholl know that the effective way to treat hard skin is to soften & regularly remove it.
1. For great results use Scholl Hard Skin Softening Cream.
2. Regularly remove hard skin using the Scholl Instant Hard Skin Remover. Scrape in a back and forth motion, applying appropriate force.
Scrape safety blade heads over hard skin.
What are the results? Instant visible improvement. Instantly improves the condition of the skin. Instantly reveals softer, smoother skin.
How do I maintain this product? Rinse under water to clean.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not use on broken, bleeding skin. Keep out of reach of children. Stop using if skin becomes sore or inflamed. Suitable for regular use.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Do not use on broken, bleeding skin. Stop using if skin becomes sore or inflamed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store safely.
